AttackModel.NameOfTheChallenge: Prototype Pollution and Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Attack
AttackerCapabilities: Knowledge of prototype pollution vulnerability in mootools JavaScript library

Vulnerabilities: Prototype pollution vulnerability in mootools JavaScript library

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker's goal is to exploit the prototype pollution vulnerability to manipulate the request object.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker manipulates the request object to set the accessGranted attribute to true, even if the request token is wrong.
StepDetails.Result: The accessGranted attribute is successfully polluted and the access denied error is prevented.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker's goal is to extract the flag character by character using an XSS attack.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker inspects the browser history and checks if a navigation has occurred (history.length === 3). If true, the attacker extracts the substring of the flag.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully extracts the full flag character by character: SEE{w4k3_up_5h33pl3_1t's_obv10us}.
